name: saas_buying_intelligence
description: Structured behavioral intelligence for B2B SaaS buying decisions. Each row represents a detected buying signal with context, criteria, objections, workflow stage, and industry classification.

decision_context.description: Brief context of the SaaS buying situation. Truncated to 240 chars for legal compliance.

criteria.description: Comma-separated evaluation criteria detected (pricing, security, scalability, integration, usability, support, features).

objection.description: Buying objections or blockers detected (too_expensive, security_concern, poor_integration, complexity, vendor_lock_in, missing_feature).

workflow_step.description: Stage in the B2B buying process (discovery, evaluation, shortlisting, trial, negotiation, procurement, implementation, renewal).

industry_hint.description: Detected industry context (healthcare, finance, education, ecommerce, technology, manufacturing, government, media).

source_url.description: Original source URL from Common Crawl.

matched_keywords.description: Comma-separated SaaS buying keywords that triggered extraction.

legal_notes.source: Common Crawl (CC-BY-4.0 terms) and optional licensed datasets
legal_notes.pii_status: All rows scanned; rows with detected PII removed
legal_notes.text_limit: All text fields limited to 240 characters
legal_notes.redistribution: This dataset contains structured insights, not raw page text. No long verbatim passages are stored.
